description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(723).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,484,0,0,0,-1).
mathematica: Denominator[Convergents[Sqrt[723], 30]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 01 2013 *)CoefficientList[Series[(1 + x - x^2) (x^4 + 9 x^2 + 1)/(x^8 - 484 x^4 + 1), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 21 2014 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1,1,8,9,476,485,3871,4356]; [n le 8 select I[n] else 484*Self(n-4)-Self(n-8): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 21 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
